title: 【适合1.2_02】JurrasiCraft v1.01侏罗纪公园！？（纯搬运）
author: outsidero
txt_content:
本帖最后由 outsidero 于 2011-2-18 12:55 编辑 

【MOD名称】JurrasiCraft【MOD版本】v1.01
【原帖地址】点击
【MOD介绍】



E文原文：

PS tired of getting raped by t-rex and raptors? - ride a bachio :D
PSS someone make a trailer with all the new stuff plz for the title page of this release

Ya even the rest of the dev team didn't know about it haha! JurrasiCraft is STILL In early release phase so don't expect it to be perfect. However, this version is A LOT better than the first release. We now have:

Brachiosaurus (with a funny face)
Tyrannosaurus (test skin)
Medium Raptors (test skin)
AND
a land dwelling early version of pterodactyls (test skin)

We've been cranking out mobs super fast and I know you guys are dying to test so here you go.


Fixes:
no glitch brachio tail
infinite dino spawn area (now they spawn everywhere)
a way to get home (right click a pterodactyl)
made it more amazing


Have fun and be sure to post your feedback!!
【下载地址】原帖下载（点击进入网盘）
